name: remotely-pull-git
description: Task used to connect to a remote server and pull repository changes using Git.
helpMarkDown: More help is available on the project [Wiki page](https://github.com/V-Network-Solutions/toolkit-for-git/wiki).
author: V-Network Solutions
instanceNameFormat: Execute git pull on remote branch to $(branchName)

inputs.name: sshEndpoint
inputs.label: SSH service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: SSH service connection with connection details for the remote machine.

inputs.name: urlStyle
inputs.label: How to Build URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select which URL style to use. More help available on the project [Wiki page](https://github.com/V-Network-Solutions/toolkit-for-git/wiki)

inputs.name: authurl
inputs.label: Full Authorized URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the shell commands to run on the remote machine. Enter each command along with its arguments on a new line. To run multiple commands together, enter them on the same line separated by semi-colons (e.g. cd /home/user/myFolder;build).

inputs.name: custom
inputs.label: Custom URL & Repo Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the shell commands to run on the remote machine. Enter each command along with its arguments on a new line. To run multiple commands together, enter them on the same line separated by semi-colons (e.g. cd /home/user/myFolder;build).

inputs.name: authUserName
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Enter **Authorization Username** to use for remote origin connection.

More help available on the project [Wiki page](https://github.com/V-Network-Solutions/toolkit-for-git/wiki)

inputs.name: authUserToken
inputs.label: Username Token
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Enter **Authorization Token** to use for remote origin connection.

More help available on the project [Wiki page](https://github.com/V-Network-Solutions/toolkit-for-git/wiki)

inputs.name: projectDirectory
inputs.label: Remote Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Enter a path to your git project on the remote server.

More help available on the project [Wiki page](https://github.com/V-Network-Solutions/toolkit-for-git/wiki)

inputs.name: customBranches
inputs.label: Use Custom Branch Names
inputs.helpMarkDown:
(optional) Check if you wish to use custom branch names.  

More help available on the project [Wiki page](https://github.com/V-Network-Solutions/toolkit-for-git/wiki)

inputs.name: remoteReleaseBranchName
inputs.label: Remote Release Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Branch to leave remote server on when complete.

More help available on the project [Wiki page](https://github.com/V-Network-Solutions/toolkit-for-git/wiki)

inputs.name: sourceReleaseBranchName
inputs.label: Source Release Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Branch to leave remote server on when complete.

More help available on the project [Wiki page](https://github.com/V-Network-Solutions/toolkit-for-git/wiki)

inputs.name: sourceDevBranchName
inputs.label: Source Dev Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Develope branch to work with from source repository.

More help available on the project [Wiki page](https://github.com/V-Network-Solutions/toolkit-for-git/wiki)

inputs.name: fetchChanges
inputs.label: Fetch Changes
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Just check for changes on remote server, then commit and push to dev branch if found.

More help available on the project [Wiki page](https://github.com/V-Network-Solutions/toolkit-for-git/wiki)

inputs.name: softError
inputs.label: Soft Error
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Throws an error message in pipeline as an alert of changes detected, but still commits and pushes changes to dev branch.

More help available on the project [Wiki page](https://github.com/V-Network-Solutions/toolkit-for-git/wiki)

inputs.name: tracked
inputs.label: Stash Un-Tracked Files
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Stash all files before pulling changes from source repository, including un-tracked files.

More help available on the project [Wiki page](https://github.com/V-Network-Solutions/toolkit-for-git/wiki)

inputs.name: customMessage
inputs.label: Customize Message
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Create a custom commit message to use.

More help available on the project [Wiki page](https://github.com/V-Network-Solutions/toolkit-for-git/wiki)

inputs.name: customCommitMessage
inputs.label: Custom Commit Message
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Add a custom commit message to use if changes are detected remotely.

More help available on the project [Wiki page](https://github.com/V-Network-Solutions/toolkit-for-git/wiki)

messages.RemoteCmdExecutionErr: Command failed with errors on remote machine.
